product_name: Continental THIS Creamy 3 in 1 Premix Instant Coffee 360g (18g*20 Sachets): Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: You get what you pay for. Excellent product
reviews.review_body: Edit: Trying this after few days of making, feels better. Changed from 1star rating to 5 star now.1 satchet can only make 1 cup coffee with 80ml water. I am adding some additional milk and sugar to make it betterUpdate : I have bought around 25 boxes in this year and a constant user. Packaging is always good and on time delivery.Preperation for best results: I use half sachet in an empty cup (100 ml size). Add little sugar and then pour hot milk. Mix it well using another glass for a refreshing cream and lather.

reviews.review_title: This is something I’ve been looking for
reviews.review_body: My 5th time repurchase. I’m currently in a hostel and this comes as a quick and easy way to have a coffee on the go.The taste as well as the consistency of the coffee is really good.Would suggest everyone reading this to at least try it out once.

reviews.review_title: Fantastic strong coffee! Just go for it
reviews.review_body: Great strong coffee aroma wthout the characteristc milk powder smell of 3 in 1 premixes, although not "creamy", but with addition of little (approx 5 tea spoons) hot milk it's just fantastic. Even without addition of milk it is very good. Just Go for it.Ps. "The creamer" is non dairy and cotains hydrogeneted fat, as the contents lists, well i don't know much about what this means

reviews.review_title: Tastes ok but the packaging was a horror!!
reviews.review_body: Worst packaging.. I received the stuff alright but the box in which it came was all from and a little wet..!The customer care at continental this is very not at all competitive.. they weren’t helpful at all.. amazon on the other hand understood the concern well..Now the taste !! It is a little bitter on taste.. no you usual coffee premix.. is costly too.. I tried cicy cafe .. they make better premixed.. and are well priced tooStill.. the tastes are different for different people, in case of coffee.. so I guess it’s worth a try!

This coffee sachets is good but when I making a coffee which have a limited taste. Item is not bad when you need a good taste u must put atleast 2 sachets and use it you can feel a little more taste.Cons:The package was not perfect because I opened my box the coffee pack was broken due to the poor packing quality. My suggestion is pls ensure that the item is securely packed otherwise it will be damaged.Pros:1, U can make a standard coffee2, standard taste3, also can use to diabetic patients because it's have  Low sugar.

reviews.review_title: wonderful blend of arabica and robusta coffee  in a cup in a second  !
reviews.review_body: the lovely blend of arabica and robusta coffee exceeded my expectation. it is a quality product at affordable price. it gives  a ahaaaa moment. it is a moment in a day you look forward to drinking a coffee which is full of aroma, taste and leaves you with a rich coffee flavour.thanks continental coffee for making my day every day !!!

* All i wanted was easy to make and drink coffee premix and "THIS" is what i came across.* "THIS" coffee premix is a proportionate mixture of milk powder + coffee powder + sugar.* Usually for those who have office job can purchase this product and all you have to do pour hot waterin the cup with this premix and there you go, enjoy hot coffee.* For those who like to drink raw coffee, "THIS" is not for you.* For those who drink coffee with milk and sugar, now you do not need to carry three different ingredients .* The packing of product is amazing.* Only thing i didn't like about "THIS" coffee premix is that it is not creamy as they say and it is a bit strong.* Rest assured i will definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: PACKAGING BY AMAZON WAS VERY BAD AND TASTE OF COFFEE NOT SO GREAT
reviews.review_body: Before going to write my review fun facts:-If you dont write in the favour of amazon or the product they will simply dont allow to post your review stating that you have violet their guidelinethat I didnt .1st of all I will give 1 star for the packaging by Amazon. The package was opened already.3.5 star for coffeeI got this for 190/- I have already tried other top brands coffee of this variants .To be honest you cant even compare the taste of continental coffee to the top brands'(I am not using the name of the brand because Amazon wont allow me post my review).Well the thing is ,money matters a lot .price of 1 pouch of continental coffee is around 10 rupees while others  charges around 25 rupees .So my suggestion is,add some amount of sugar and milk powder/milk if you dont like the taste or instead of 1 pouch use 2 pouch of these coffee to feel the taste .After some days I will give another review ,may be at that time I would like the tasteEDIT:- Now I start liking the taste of this coffee.Strong
